mapper.select: SELECT staff_id staffId, staff_name staffName, shelter_id shelterId, staff_level staffLevel FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId} AND staff_pw = PASSWORD(#{staffPw}) AND staff_active = '1';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId} AND staff_pw = PASSWORD(#{staffPw});
SELECT staff_id staffId, staff_email staffEmail, shelter_id shelterId, staff_name staffName, staff_phone staffPhone, staff_level staffLevel FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staffId};
SELECT staff_id staffId, staff_name staffName FROM staff WHERE shelter_id = #{shelterId} AND staff_level = '0';

SELECT staff_id staffId, staff_name staffName, staff_level staffLevel, staff_active staffActive, CASE WHEN staff_level = '0' THEN '대기중' WHEN staff_level = '2' THEN '마스터' WHEN staff_active = '0' THEN '비활성' ELSE '수정' END 'state' FROM staff WHERE shelter_id = #{shelterId} ORDER BY staff_active DESC, staff_level ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff( staff_id, staff_email, shelter_id, staff_name, staff_phone, staff_active, staff_level, staff_pw, update_date ) VALUE( #{staffId}, #{staffEmail}, #{shelterId}, #{staffName}, #{staffPhone}, '1', '0', PASSWORD(#{staffPw}), NOW() );
